text: @TIME Physicians who prescribe medications at the request of a patient for unapproved use is wrong. What does it say about the physician who complies? Is this an acceptable way to practice medicine? Who is liable?  @WhiteHouse @POTUS @realDonaldTrump @AmerMedicalAssn @acgme #COVID19
